name: PixelForce
description:
The goal is to defeat the enemy general within the time limit. Your general is immobile and you must give commands to your army.

This was a tiny strategy game built for the https://itch.io/jam/miz-jam-1

This is my first game jam game (actually my first game). 

The tiny sprite people reminded me of the tiny sprite armies in DragonForce. I roughly got the battle system, but without the strategic map, the game feels very different.

There are a ton of things I'd like to fix/improve but that's the fun of a Game Jam
At some point I may revisit this to add features like:

  • Sound
  • Less bugs
  • Fix z-ordering issues
  • Unit balancing

This game can be played in browser, but the physics gets buggy (collisions sometimes get missed) and unit placement is more painful (you can click and drag to place units in the downloadable versions)

BitPotion Font by Joeb Rogers https://joebrogers.itch.io/bitpotion

Art assets from https://kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack

Built with the Godot Game Engine
